description:
An elderly couple is blessed with a daughter born from a bamboo stalk, a little boy’s sister has become a real demon, and a worker is terrified of meat buns.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaguya-hime / Oni no Imouto / Manjuu Kowai
Princess Kaguya / The Demon`s Little Sister / Scary Sweet Buns
かぐや姫 / 鬼の妹 / まんじゅうこわい
